articles.content: In context: Apple threatened to remove longtime macOS utility Amphetamine from the Mac App Store in late December for violating the App Store Guidelines due to the app's name. However, Apple has sinc… [+2147 chars]

articles.title: WhatsApp set an all-time record for calls on New Year's Eve - Engadget
articles.description: WhatsApp had its most calls in a single day on New Year's Eve as the pandemic forced people to have virtual get-togethers.
articles.content: The COVID-19 pandemic forced many to have virtual New Year’s Eve get-togethers, and that’s very clearly reflected in WhatsApp’s numbers. Facebook’s chat app set a record as 2020 came to a close, with… [+478 chars]
